tag_professor: Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER  RESPECTED
comments: Theo is a great person. Lectures are not that bad, though can get tedious sometimes. The course design makes sense, yet the materials are very easy to get confused for the example so be aware!! Only negative part is his exams are super difficult. It is very hard to get an A in this class. ALL of his test questions are short answer but quite vague!!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Dr. Dreher holds very high standards to the students going through his class (he is the chair of the department) and expects you to already know/remember everything about genetics from BI314/MB302/BI20X. He seems to deeply care about his students success and is great in office hours. Sometimes he lectures too quietly

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Theo may have an aussie accent, but don\'t let that fool you since he talks in circles. Learning from the book is the best option and the book is very easy to understand. Just make sure to memorize that material.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This guy is great! He has an awesome Aussie accent, is meticulous in his descriptions, and is very excited to discuss the subject matter outside of class. The textbook was written by one of our OSU professors and has some useful diagrams.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: A lot of the material is review from BI 314 and MB 302 but Theo really likes to delve deeper into the details of microbial genetics. make sure to go to class because of the surprise "quizzes"

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Dr. Dreher is a horrible professor. He mumbles, he doesn\'t explain anything, and everything is his interpretation. The course is very interesting if you just read the book, but he gives surprise in class assignments so you have to go to class. The material is not hard, but you will HATE your term if you try to learn anything from him.
